page.title: 10Industry page 1
page.content: The main industry in the Halling area is Cement manufacturing which involves quarrying and production. The Romans were the first to use cement.It was called lime-mortar. Sometimes it crumbled,so stronger cement was developed using clinker, made by heating chalk and clay.The cement industry grew in Kent because clay was available from the river estuaries and chalk from the North Downs. In the 1890's people used cement to cover the walls of their houses so it looked as if they were made of Portland stone,which cost too much money. The development of Portland cement and a building boom in the nineteenth century meant led to great changes in the area.
